REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2390 reute r f BC-MARCUS-<MRCS>-VOTES-5 03-20 0044

TEXT.TITLE: MARCUS <MRCS> VOTES 50 PCT STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Marcus Corp said its board voted a 50 pct stock dividend to be distributed May 1, record April 15. It said the dividend applies equally to holders of its common stock and Class B common. Reuter
